scripts.docker:sh: docker-compose build --build-arg SSH_PRIVATE_KEY="$(cat git_key)" && docker-compose --project-name event-tracker-service run event-tracker-service ash -c "export NODE_ENV=test && exec ash"
scripts.docker:test: docker-compose build --build-arg SSH_PRIVATE_KEY="$(cat git_key)" && docker-compose --project-name event-tracker-service run --service-ports event-tracker-service ash -c "export NODE_ENV=test && npm run test"
scripts.docker:ci: docker-compose build --build-arg SSH_PRIVATE_KEY="$SSH_PRIVATE_KEY" && docker-compose --project-name event-tracker-service run --service-ports event-tracker-service ash -c "export NODE_ENV=test && npm run ci-pipeline"
scripts.ci-pipeline: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.ecr:login:prod: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 610779199836.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com
scripts.ecr:login:qa: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-west-2 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 610779199836.dkr.ecr.us-west-2.amazonaws.com
scripts.deploy:qa: npm run ecr:login:qa && rm -rf .serverless && npx serverless deploy --stage qa --region us-west-2 --verbose
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run ecr:login:prod && rm -rf .serverless && npx serverless deploy --stage production --region us-east-1 --verbose
